help.overview: This plugin allows admins to control the bot.
help.command: Causes the bot to quit irc.
help.usage: quit [quit message] Causes the bot to join a channel. join #channelname Causes the bot to part a channel. part #channelname Causes the bot to cycle (part and rejoin) a channel. cycle #channelname Causes the bot to say something to the specified channel. say #channelname some text to say Causes the bot to send a message to the specified nickname. msg nickname some text to send Causes the bot to op you in a given channel if you are both a user and a valid op for that channel. op #channelname
